pages.text: $(italic)You've already used your anvil - or much more anvils - plenty. However, both $(l:general/anvil_crushing)Anvil Crushing$() and repairing and enchanting tools always damage them so quickly that they become irreparably damaged.$(br)To make the anvil more stable - or even indestructible - you need a harder material.
The anvil made of Bedrock has two distinct advantages over normal anvils:$(li)It is indestructible$(li)It removes the "too expensive" limit of the normal anvil when repairing and enchanting tools.
